entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Delson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
